title: Ground-breaking Development in Bitcoin Mining: VNBTC Launches Cloud Mining Platform Helping Investors Earn Bitcoin Mining Rewards
description: LONDON, July 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — The recent rise of Bitcoin price past the 120K saw crypto become the hottest topic in the financial and crypto investment space. According to Michael Saylor’s sentiment, “the only thing better than Bitcoin is acquiring more Bitcoin”. As such, Bitcoin accumulation may not be dying down anytime soon. […]
